title: Lap trinh vien Frontend - ReactJS
description: Chung toi dang tim kiem mot lap trinh vien Frontend tai nang co kinh nghiem voi ReactJS de gia nhap doi ngu phat trien san pham cua chung toi. Ban se co co hoi lam viec voi cac cong nghe hien dai va tham gia xay dung nhung ung dung web chat luong cao.
requirements: Co it nhat 2 nam kinh nghiem voi ReactJS, thanh thao HTML, CSS, JavaScript ES6+, co kinh nghiem voi TypeScript, hieu biet ve Redux hoac Context API
